title: Real-time Model Training Dashboard
description:
Design a dashboard that updates in real time with model training progress: metrics, logs, and run status. Focus on streaming data into the UI, keeping it responsive under frequent updates, and handling reconnects or backpressure.

Key considerations:
- Live progress bars, charts, and logs.
- WebSocket/SSE vs polling and update cadence.
- Buffering, throttling, and list virtualization.
- Error states, reconnect logic, and stale data handling.

You should be prepared to talk about: data flow from stream to UI, data model for metrics/logs, and how you keep the interface fast during bursts.
